select to_char(b.dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as hiredate , to_char(b.dt,'DY') as day, nvl(a.cnt,0) as cnt from ( select to_char(hire_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as hiredate, count(*) as cnt from employees where hire_date between to_date(#{startDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') and to_date(#{endDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') group by hire_date ) a , ( select to_date(#{startDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') + level - 1 as dt from dual connect by level <= (to_date(#{endDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') - to_date(#{startDate},'YYYY-MM-DD')+ 1) ) b where b.dt = a.hiredate(+) order by b.dt
